info.description: This file describes the available endpoints for administering a LogRhythm deployment. For more information about tokens, security, and registering third party applications, see the documentation available at https://docs.logrhythm.com/docs/lrapi/administration-api.

query.description: The starting point of records to be returned.
The number of results to be returned.
Sorts records by name or Id.
Sorts records by ascending or descending.
Object name filter.
Filters records by object description.
Filters results for a specific System Monitor Id in resources.
Filters User records by Entity Id.
Filters results for a specific Message Source Type Id in resources.
Filters results by whether the resource is virtual.
Filters results by load balanced status of the component.
Filters records by object recordStatus.
Filters results for one or more hosts.
